objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, Engagement_List_Configuration_Status__c, Start_Date__c, Max_Number_Of_Call_Attempts__c, Communication_Channel__c,Instrument__c, Qualtrics_Instrument_ID__c,Description__c, Purpose__c, Briefing_Notes__c,Email_Template__c  FROM Engagement_List_Configuration__c

SELECT Id, Engagement_List_Configuration__c, Engagement_List_Criteria_Title__c,Status__c, Start_Date__c, Description__c, Completed_Cadence__c, Previous_Academic_Status__c, Academic_Status__c, Category_Type__c, Key_Date__c, Key_Date_Offset_Lower_Boundary__c, Key_Date_Offset_Upper_Boundary__c,RecordTypeId  FROM Engagement_List_Criteria__c
SELECT Id, DeveloperName, SobjectType, Name From RecordType Where SobjectType IN ('Engagement_List_Criteria__c')
